Text: Re phone callJeff Sorry it took me so long to write I havent actually used my email in about months but Im trying to turn over a new leaf Freak show huh Whats been going on Happy Belated Birthday Again Im so sorry I didnt call you on the day Im quite scattered now with being a Mom and working days a week Maddie is doing great Shes and months now crawling up a storm pulling herself up drinking from a straw waving goodbye and even dancing Shes still a pain in the ass at night however waking up times UUUGH Id love to talk to you Heres my info AGAIN Nicole Lesser Grant Street W Newton MA Love you Nicole Do You Yahoo Send instant messages get email alerts with Yahoo Messenger

family updatepostcardeveryone Weve just returned from a vacation to the Pacific Northwest Some of you know because we visited you there This is a picture of us at Crater Lake in southern Oregon The trip was simultaneously wonderful and sad We saw the greatest people and most breathtaking scenery on our way to the funeral of our friend Richard a beautiful person who died after a long battle with cancer Im wearing his red sox cap in the picture which has been returned to the city from which it came Last week Maddie had her first birthday which was attended by many family and friends Keep checking the photo gallery for pictures from this event as well as halloween trickortreating once we get the film developed The web site is as follows Ijspmn Weve put up a few more vacation pictures as well Hope this finds you all well and enjoying life and each other Love Adam Nic and Maddie Do You Yahoo From homework help to love advice Yahoo Experts has your answer Postcardjpg

RE New Maddie Pics with Our New Digital CameraHi Jeff Great to get your note I hope you are doing well Think of you often Drop me a line sometime and let me know whats going on in your life I love to live vicariously through you Happy Turkey Day Love Nicole wrote Hi you guys thanks for all the pics theyve meant a lot Have a great thanksgiving and hopefully I really will make it up to Boston sometime Hugs Jeff Original Message From Adam and Nicole Lesser ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAdamandNicoleLesserCfurielesserrocketmailEcomE NRONcom Sent Saturday June PM To Ken Rhines Ron Rosenblum Carien the pics she cut herself under her right eye falling down the stairs in front of our house Shes posing in front of the offending bricks in one photo Shes fine and hopes you all havent fallen down any ReHi Jeff Happy Birthday to you too Ive been meaning to call or write but the last two weeks have been a little crazy Our cat had to have surgery weeks ago last week Maddie was sick all week and on Sunday she feel off the front steps and got a big black eye very impressive Not too much else is going on Im still working days a week but will be going up to in the fall I feel pretty mixed about it Im hoping that Ill actually be less stressed because Ill have more time to get my job done and wont have to do so much work at home Of course I dont want to be away from Maddie but shes pretty happy going to day care and well enjoy the extra income We havent traveled too much In October we went to Oregon March to Baltimore to visit family and May to Florida Sounds like you have been having some great adventures Maddie travels pretty well but were not up for foreign travel yet Adam has begun a private practice So far lots of referrals but few actual clients It takes a while for these things to fall into place Maddie is doing well She wasnt really eating last fall and winter but she is getting back on track and gaining weight Shes lots of fun silly and flirty like her mother Im going to be in big trouble when she goes to Kutz I cant remember when I spoke to you last but we had kind of a difficult fallwinter Two friends died plus a few older relatives Its made us very grateful for what we have Were hoping that the cluster of bad things is gone now that spring is here Well Id love to talk to you sometime to hear more about all your dates I need to live vicariously through you I have a great Jewish girl for you here but I dont know if she would ever move to Houston Good luck with work stuff and take good care of yourself Lots of love Nicole Shankman Jeffrey A JeffreyA NRONcom wrote Hi Nicole Happy Birthday Imagine a chorus singing Hope youve been well Hows the family Details pleaseGenerally things have been status quo around hereswamped in the office although Ive been on a lot of dates these last few months Surprisingly I dont hate them all Ive been travelling quite a bit and am ready for a little home life Australia London Mexico various USetc although Im trying not to go to Nigeria for a big deal we are working on Im putting in a pool and hopefully that will help me vacation at home a little It should be down in months Of course it should have been done last year but I have no time to do anything Drop a line when you can Lots of love and hugs Jeff Do You Yahoo Get personalized email addresses from Yahoo Mail only a year
